replies.body_tagged: So how did it go? (What we were discussing on Slack)

replies.body:
@cammy_G Your decent moderator. You got a lot of potential. But your a good guy, very considerate of others. 

@pokerface Well, usually i get 3 bars but whenever i start to scrim it just drops ( or any other time for that matter). 

Well, i don't see you to much anymore. Your pretty dedicated to your team, as far as i can see, and your decent at pvp. 

19

replies.body:
@Crazy_creeper521

Well, my favourite  moment would have to be when i was promoted to Senior Moderator. 
Well, that's hard. There are a lot of things i would want to do. But the most important thing to do would be that i'd change the Senior Moderator colour to purple, cause purple is a great colour. :^) 

(Nah seriously tho, if i could snap my fingers then it would be to fix the lag. Since it effects a lot of people, including myself.)

replies.body:
@rinnjr 

Your a good person. You have certainly improved a lot over the last few months. I look forward to working closer with you when it comes to translating :) 

@itsetuhoinenn
I decided it would be best not to go through with it, for obvious reasons. I will focus on other stuff. (If that makes sense) I'll talk to you about it in community slack.
